D

deleteClient() - Method in class pl.polsl.lab1.controller.Controller
method, whichh asks for parameters, builds a client and delete it from a database if the client does not exist in a database it informs the user about it and try to get another id number from a user
deleteClient(Client) - Method in class pl.polsl.lab1.database.Connection
Method providing a connection to database and delating an entity in a client table
deleteOrder() - Method in class pl.polsl.lab1.controller.Controller
method, whichh asks for parameters, builds an order and delete it from a database if the order does not exist in a database it informs the user about it and try to get another id number from a user
deleteOrder(Ordercl) - Method in class pl.polsl.lab1.database.Connection
Method providing a connection to database and delating an entity in an order table
